Art.title: Art
Art.description: I Have been making art pieces since around 13 years old, my mom first got me into it and I have been hooked since, you can see one of my pieces on display here

Hockey/Sports.title: Hockey/Sports
Hockey/Sports.description: I have been a hockey fan all my life, my favourite team is the Buffalo Sabres! I don't only watch hockey, I'm a big baseball fan and have started to watch more NFL games and F1 races

Vintage Clothes.title: Vintage Clothes/Fashtion
Vintage Clothes.description: I have been collecting vintage gear for the past 5 years and are always building on my collection of pieces
